Basic Antenna Design
====================

by [fydamohd](https://fke.utm.my/author/fydamohd/ "Posts by fydamohd")
 | Nov 5, 2023 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/3-1080x675.png)

**Assalamualaikum and Good Day.**

Dear students, you are cordially invited to attend a talk that is planned in conjunction with the FKE Industry Day. The talk schedule is as announced in the poster.

**Speaker:** Associate Prof. Dr. Mohd Haizal Jamaluddin  
**Title:** Basic Antenna Design: From Simulation to Measurement and its Applications  
**Date:** 6 November 2023

All students, especially postgraduates, are invited to attend. Please note that the faculty will implement a rule where postgraduate students are required to attend certain number of talks organized by the faculty.

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/3.png "3")
